pkgmetadata.longdescription: # InferrdInferrd is a hosting platform for TensorFlow.### AuthenticationIn order to use this library you need to get a api token from [inferrd.com](https://inferrd.com)Authenticate with the `inferrd.auth` method:```pythonimport inferrdinferrd.auth('<token>')```### Deploying TensorFlowFirst, create a model on [inferrd.com](https://inferrd.com) and select the kind of instance you want. Then simple call `inferrd.deploy_tf`:```pythonimport inferrd# this only needs to be done onceinferrd.auth('<token>')# deploy TFinferrd.deploy_tf(tf_model, '<name of the model>')```### Fetching predictionsInferrd allows us to pull predictions back into your notebook by using `inferrd.get_requests`:```pythonimport inferrd# this only needs to be done onceinferrd.auth('<token>')# get the requestsrequests = inferrd.get_requests('<name of the model>', limit=100, page=0, includeFailures=False)```
